trans-unit.source: Represents a claim for a <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken" /> security token that asserts that the subject was authenticated by a particular means at a particular time.
trans-unit.target: 특정 시간에 특정 수단으로 주체가 인증되었음을 어설션하는 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken" /> 보안 토큰의 클레임을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> security tokens specify their claims using SAML assertions, which can specify when the subject was authenticated.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> 보안 토큰은 주체가 인증된 시기를 지정할 수 있는 SAML 어설션을 사용하여 클레임을 지정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The claims in a SAML assertion are represented by SAML statements.
trans-unit.target: SAML 어설션의 클레임은 SAML 설명으로 표현됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The SAML specification defines a set of SAML statement types and one of them is a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement>.
trans-unit.target: SAML 사양에서는 일련의 SAML 설명 형식을 정의하며 그 중 하나가 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement>입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement> asserts that the statement's subject was authenticated by a particular means at a particular time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement>는 설명의 주체가 특정 시간에 특정 수단으로 인증되었음을 어설션합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement" /> class.
A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubject" /> that represents the subject of the claim.
A URI reference that specifies how the subject was authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 주체가 인증된 방법을 지정하는 URI 참조입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that specifies the instant in time at which the subject was authenticated.
The DNS domain name in which the computer that authenticated the subject resides.
trans-unit.target: 주체를 인증한 컴퓨터가 있는 DNS 도메인 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: The IP address of the computer that authenticated the subject.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> of type <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding" /> that contains additional information about the subject.
trans-unit.target: 주체에 대한 추가 정보를 포함하는 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> 형식의 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement" /> class using the specified authentication details.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 인증 정보를 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: The set of authentication methods is extensible; however the following table contains the set of authentication methods defined in the SAML specification.
trans-unit.target: 다음 표에 SAML 사양에 정의된 인증 방법의 집합이 나와 있습니다. 단 인증 방법의 집합은 확장 가능합니다.

trans-unit.source: Authentication method
URI
Password
urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:password
Kerberos
urn:ietf:rfc:1510
Secure Remote Password (SRP)
urn:ietf:rfc:2945
Hardware Token
URI:urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:HardwareToken
SSL/TLS Certificate Based Client Authentication
urn:ietf:rfc:2246
PGP Public Key
urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:PGP
SPKI Public Key
urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:SPKI
XKMS Public Key
urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:XKMS
XML Digital Signature
urn:ietf:rfc:3075
Unspecified
urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:unspecified
When the `authenticationMethod` parameter is `null`, the authentication method is set to `urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:unspecified`.
<paramref name="authorityBindings" /> contains a member that is <see langword="null" />.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" /> of type <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim" /> that contains the set of claims to add to.
Adds a claim based on the properties of this instance to the specified collection of claims.
trans-unit.target: 이 인스턴스의 속성을 기반으로 하는 클레임을 지정된 클레임 컬렉션에 추가합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AddClaimsToList%28System.Collections.Generic.IList%7BSystem.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim%7D%29> method adds a claim to the `claims` parameter based on the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationInstant%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationMethod%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthorityBindings%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.ClaimType%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.DnsAddress%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IPAddress%2A>, and properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AddClaimsToList%28System.Collections.Generic.IList%7BSystem.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim%7D%29> 메서드는 `claims`, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationInstant%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationMethod%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthorityBindings%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.ClaimType%2A> 및 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.DnsAddress%2A> 속성을 기반으로 클레임을 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IPAddress%2A> 매개 변수에 추가합니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="claims" /> is <see langword="null" />.
Gets or sets the instant in time at which the subject was authenticated.
A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that specifies the instant in time at which the subject was authenticated.
<list type="table"><listheader><term> Exception type
</term><description> Condition

</description></listheader><item><term><see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /></term><description> The <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationInstant" /> property is set and the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IsReadOnly" /> property is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: </description></listheader><item><term><see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /></term><description> <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationInstant" /> 속성을 설정 및 <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IsReadOnly" /> 속성은 <see langword="true" />합니다.

trans-unit.source: The time is stored in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationInstant%2A> property corresponds to the `AuthenticationInstant` attribute of the `<AuthenticationStatement>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) specification.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationInstant%2A> 속성은 OASIS SAML(Security Assertion Markup Language)의 어설션 및 프로토콜 사양에 정의된 `AuthenticationInstant` 요소의 `<AuthenticationStatement>` 특성에 해당합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the method used to authenticate the subject.
trans-unit.target: 주체를 인증하는 데 사용되는 방법을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The method used to authenticate the subject.
The default value is <see langword="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:unspecified" />.
The set of authentication methods is extensible; however the following table contains the set of authentication methods defined in the SAML specification.
trans-unit.target: 다음 표에 SAML 사양에 정의된 인증 방법의 집합이 나와 있습니다. 단 인증 방법의 집합은 확장 가능합니다.

trans-unit.source: Authentication method
URI
Password
urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:password
Kerberos
urn:ietf:rfc:1510
Secure Remote Password (SRP)
urn:ietf:rfc:2945
Hardware Token
URI:urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:HardwareToken
SSL/TLS Certificate Based Client Authentication
urn:ietf:rfc:2246
PGP Public Key
urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:PGP
SPKI Public Key
urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:SPKI
XKMS Public Key
urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:XKMS
XML Digital Signature
urn:ietf:rfc:3075
Unspecified
urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:unspecified

When the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationMethod%2A> property is set to `null`, the authentication method is set to `urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:unspecified`.

The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationMethod%2A> property corresponds to the `AuthenticationMethod` attribute of the `<AuthenticationStatement>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) specification.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationMethod%2A> 속성은 OASIS SAML(Security Assertion Markup Language)의 어설션 및 프로토콜 사양에 정의된 `AuthenticationMethod` 요소의 `<AuthenticationStatement>` 특성에 해당합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationMethod" /> property is set and the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IsReadOnly" /> property is <see langword="true" />.
Gets additional information about the subject.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" /> of type <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding" /> that contains additional information about the subject.
trans-unit.target: 주체에 대한 추가 정보를 포함하는 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" /> 형식의 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthorityBindings%2A> property corresponds to a set of `<AuthorityBinding>` child elements for an `<AuthenticationStatement>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) specification.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthorityBindings%2A> 속성은 OASIS SAML(Security Assertion Markup Language)의 어설션 및 프로토콜 사양에 정의된 `<AuthorityBinding>` 요소의 `<AuthenticationStatement>` 자식 요소 집합에 해당합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of security claim.
A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimTypes" /> that specifies the type of security claim.
Always <c>http://schemas.microsoft.com/mb/2005/09/ClaimType/SamlAuthentication</c>.
Gets or sets the DNS domain name in which the computer that authenticated the subject resides.
trans-unit.target: 주체를 인증한 컴퓨터가 있는 DNS 도메인 이름을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The DNS domain name in which the computer that authenticated the subject resides.
trans-unit.target: 주체를 인증한 컴퓨터가 있는 DNS 도메인 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.DnsAddress%2A> property corresponds to the `DNSAddress` attribute of the `<SubjectLocality>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) specification.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.DnsAddress%2A> 속성은 OASIS SAML(Security Assertion Markup Language)의 어설션 및 프로토콜 사양에 정의된 `DNSAddress` 요소의 `<SubjectLocality>` 특성에 해당합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.DnsAddress" /> property is set and the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IsReadOnly" /> property is <see langword="true" />.
Gets or sets the IP address of the computer that authenticated the subject.
trans-unit.target: 주체를 인증한 컴퓨터의 IP 주소를 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The IP address of the computer that authenticated the subject.

The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IPAddress%2A> property corresponds to the `IPAddress` attribute of the `<SubjectLocality>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) specification.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IPAddress%2A> 속성은 OASIS SAML(Security Assertion Markup Language)의 어설션 및 프로토콜 사양에 정의된 `IPAddress` 요소의 `<SubjectLocality>` 특성에 해당합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the properties of this instance are read-only.
trans-unit.target: 이 인스턴스의 속성이 읽기 전용인지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the properties of this instance are read-only; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 이 인스턴스의 속성이 읽기 전용이면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.

To make this instance of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement> class read-only, call the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.MakeReadOnly%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement> 클래스의 이 인스턴스를 읽기 전용으로 만들려면 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.MakeReadOnly%2A> 메서드를 호출합니다.

trans-unit.source: Causes this instance to be read-only.

When the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.MakeReadOnly%2A> method is called, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IsReadOnly%2A> property is set to `true` and properties of this instance can no longer be set.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.MakeReadOnly%2A> 메서드를 호출하면 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IsReadOnly%2A> 속성이 `true`로 설정되고 이 인스턴스의 속성을 더 이상 설정할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader" /> to read the SAML authentication statement.
A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer" /> that is capable of reading XML elements in the SAML authentication statement that is defined in the SAML specification.
trans-unit.target: SAML 사양에 정의된 SAML 인증 설명에서 XML 요소를 읽을 수 있는 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver" /> that determines the security token that created the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: 디지털 서명을 만든 보안 토큰을 확인하는 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Reads the SAML authentication statement from the specified XML reader.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 XML 판독기에서 SAML 인증 설명을 읽습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.ReadXml%28System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver%29> method sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationInstant%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationMethod%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthorityBindings%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.DnsAddress%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IPAddress%2A>, and properties.
<paramref name="reader" /> is <see langword="null" />
-or-
<paramref name="samlSerializer" /> is <see langword="null" />
<paramref name="reader" /> refers to an XML element that does not contain the <see langword="AuthenticationInstant" /> and <see langword="AuthenticationMethod" /> attributes.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="reader" />가 <see langword="AuthenticationInstant" /> 및 <see langword="AuthenticationMethod" /> 특성을 포함하지 않는 XML 요소를 참조하는 경우

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="reader" /> refers to an XML element that does not have a <see langword="<saml:Subject>" /> child element.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="reader" />가 <see langword="<saml:Subject>" /> 자식 요소가 없는 XML 요소를 참조하는 경우

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" /> to write the SAML authentication statement.
A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer" /> that is capable of writing XML elements in a SAML assertion.
trans-unit.target: SAML 어설션에 XML 요소를 쓸 수 있는 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Writes the SAML authentication statement into the specified XML serializer.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 XML serializer에 SAML 인증 설명을 씁니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="writer" /> is <see langword="null" />
-or-
<paramref name="samlSerializer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
